programme.desc: Это история о том, как ошибки молодости могут повлиять на всю дальнейшую жизнь.

programme.title: Жить ради любви
programme.desc: Это история о том, как ошибки молодости могут повлиять на всю дальнейшую жизнь.

programme.title: Женский доктор

programme.title: Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. Славик уезжает на заработки. Пользуясь тем, что Славик в коме, Алёна выгоняет Надежду с детьми из квартиры. После длительных скитаний Надежда оставляет младенца в бэби-боксе. Соколова и Борадзе предлагают Глаше уволиться по собственному желанию. Борадзе сообщает коллективу о том, что подкидыша усыновила семья Нескоромовых. Коллектив перинатального центра прощается с Милославской - сердце коллеги остановилось. Славик выходит из комы, Алёна признается ему в своем вранье.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. programme.title: Жених
programme.desc: Главный герой безумно любит свою жену, красавицу. Она же постоянно изменяет ему и… рожает почти каждый год по ребенку.. Всех детей Валера растит как родных. Он им и отец, и мать. Однажды Люся исчезает из дому вовсе, встретив "новую любовь"- иностранца… В тот же год с Голубевым случается горе… Как сложится судьба одинокого многодетного отца и его малышей? Что станет с беспутной мамашей на чужбине? Это история любви, предательства, прощения, а еще — преодоления себя.

Однажды Люся исчезает из дому вовсе, встретив "новую любовь"- иностранца… В тот же год с Голубевым случается горе… Как сложится судьба одинокого многодетного отца и его малышей? Что станет с беспутной мамашей на чужбине? Это история любви, предательства, прощения, а еще — преодоления себя.

programme.title: Жить ради любви
programme.desc: Это история о том, как ошибки молодости могут повлиять на всю дальнейшую жизнь.

programme.title: Жить ради любви
programme.desc: Это история о том, как ошибки молодости могут повлиять на всю дальнейшую жизнь.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Женский доктор

programme.title: Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Дневники Темного

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Thriller. Thriller, produced in 2012. Co-produced by the USA and the UK. A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Camino
programme.desc: A photojournalist is forced to flee through the Colombian jungle when she captures something she wasnt supposed to. Survival thriller with Zoe Bell and Nacho Vigalondo.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Jungle Boy
programme.desc: In a humble village on the edge of the jungle, a young boy strays from his mother to play with a monkey. Lost in the jungle, he is saved by the great elephant, who will raise him as a member of the great family of animals. When he grows up he helps to protect the jungle from a ruthless poacher.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. With no formal experience or education to speak of, she must rely on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: Science fiction movie. Canadian sci-fi, produced in 2017. A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: Citizen Verdict
programme.desc: Marty Rockman, producer of the hit reality show "So Sue Me," has a brand new concept: "Citizen Verdict." Every week, a real-life criminal case will be tried before the American people, but this time, they will also be the jury. If the defendant is found guilty in a death penalty case, Rockman will broadcast the execution.

programme.title: Slackers
programme.desc: Dave Goodman, Sam Schecter, and Jeff Davis are best friends who have spent almost four years at Holden University scamming their way through college. During one exam scam in their final semester Dave discovers Angela, and asks her out while writing his phone number on her exam sheet. Ethan Dulles (who calls himself "Cool Ethan"), a classmate obsessed with Angela to the extent of collecting loose hairs and making a hair doll and having surveillance photos and a shrine to Angela setup in his dorm room, takes her exam question sheet after Angela leaves and uses it to repeatedly confront and then blackmail the guys into setting up a successful date with Angela for him in exchange for his silence on the matter. The guys set Ethan up in multiple situations in an attempt to convince Angela to like him, while Dave tells Sam during their work researching her that Angela is no more important to him as any other scam theyve done. Ethan fails to attract her after frequent confrontations based on his delusional behavior, immaturity and ignorance of social norms. Though Ethan seems a lonely harmless nerd, he is scheming, psychotically obsessive and hopelessly socially incompetent.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: A South Central L.A. con artist with rap skills tries to keep bill collectors and his lover, with marriage in mind, at bay by entering a poetry contest staged by a small Irish town. Can his rhyming skills help the town and win him the prize money?

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Shoreditch
programme.desc: Set both on the eve of World War II in a shady Shoreditch nightclub and in present-day London. Thirtysomething Tom tries to solve a murder that was committed in the club decades before.

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: The great Wesley Snipes (Blade himself!) stars as "The Hunter" in this Mauro Borrelli (The Ghostmaker) directed film. The Recall also stars RJ Mitte (Breaking Bad), Jedidiah Goodacre (Descendants), Niko Pepaj (Awkward), Laura Maria Bilgeri (Toby Goes to Camp) and Hannah Rose May (Ballers). The movie tells the tale of five friends vacationing at a remote lake house, expecting nothing less than a good time. Unbeknownst to them, Earth is under an alien invasion and in the thralls of a mass-abduction. Director Borelli is a former collaborator of director Tim Burton and the film illustrator for blockbuster films such as Pirates of the Caribbean and Captain America. The Recall will also be shot for the new Barco Escape three-screen, panoramic theatrical format, which fully surrounds audiences and offers the ultimate immersive cinema experience. Portions of the films will also be shot in Virtual Reality.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy) is a long-time "cooler" at the Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas: he is paid to bring his black cloud to any table where a gambler is on a roll. But when Bernies luck starts changing for the better--thanks in part to a pretty cocktail waitress--he suddenly loses his cooling talents, incurring the ire of the casino owner in the process.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Patriotu diena
programme.desc: Režisors: Pīters Bergs. Lomās: Marks Vālbergs, Džons Gudmens, Kevins Bēkons, Mišela Monegana, Dž. K. Simonss, Alekss Volfs, Temo Melikadze, Melisa Benuā. Filmas pamatā ir traģiskie notikumi Bostonas maratonā 2013. gadā. Uzreiz pēc sprādzieniem policijas seržants Tomijs Sonderss un FIB aģentu komanda uzsāka teroristu meklēšanu. Brāļu Carnajevu notveršana izrādījās viena no sarežģītākajām un spraigākajām operācijām policijas vēsturē. Režisors Pīters Bergs un aktieris Marks Vālbergs rekonstruējuši teroristu nodomus un to realizāciju, kas izdzēsa vairākas dzīvības un sakustināja iluzorās drošības pamatus. Patriotu diena ir viena no ASV Austrumu krasta oficiālajām brīvdienām, un kopš 1969. gada Masačūsetsas štatā to atzīmē aprīļa trešajā pirmdienā. Tās nozīmīgākais notikums ir Bostonas maratons, kam ir vairāk nekā 100 gadus senas saknes, un 2013. gadā tas pārvērtās par slaktiņu, ko pirms finiša līnijas noorganizēja divi Kirgizstānā dzimuši brāļi. Divus gadus pēc Bostonas maratona traģēdijas rakstnieks Keisijs Šērmens un Bostonas žurnālists Deivs Vedžs izdeva grāmatu, kas atklāja 2013. gada aprīļa notikumus. Tā kļuvusi par pamatu scenārijam, kas pārvērsts asa sižeta trillerī ar Marku Vālbergu, Džonu Gudmenu, Kevinu Bēkonu, Dž. K. Simonsu un Mišelu Monegani galvenajās lomās.

programme.title: Kā tu to zini?
programme.desc: Lisa ir slavena softbola spēlētāja, taču visam reiz pienāk gals - viņa tiek atskaitīta no valsts izlases komandas. Džordžs, kurš vienmēr dzīvē juties drošs un pārliecināts, tiek izraidīts no tēva uzņēmuma. Abi, zaudējuši pamatu zem kājām, mierinājumu meklē attiecībās. Džordžu gan tieši pamet arī draudzene, bet Lisas pielūdzējs nav īsti nekam derīgs. Kad Lisu un Džordžu kopā saved pats liktenis, šķiet, ka viņi varētu palīdzēt viens otram atrast izeju no šīs sarežģītās situācijas.

programme.desc: Pastaiga ziemas brīnumzemē

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Cīņa
programme.desc: FIB aģents meklē iespēju atriebties noslēpumainam slepkavam "Rogue", kas nogalinājis viņa partneri.

programme.title: Pils zemē
programme.desc: Pēc mātes pāragras nāves pusaudzis sadraudzējas ar savu harizmātisko, tomēr nemierīgo kaimiņu, un nonāk atkarību un vardarbības pasaulē. Tas notiek tieši tad, kad viņu mazpilsētu pārņem opioīdu epidēmija.

programme.title: Sairuss
programme.desc: Džons ir šķīries pusmūža vīrietis, kas samierinājies ar domu par dzīvi vientulībā. Bijusī sievas, kas joprojām ir viņa labākā draudzene, gandrīz ar varu aizved Džonu uz viesībām, kur viņš iepazīstas ar savu sapņu sievieti - Molliju. Abi sāk tikties un drīz vien iemīlas, taču Mollijas greizsirdīgais dēls Sairuss, kuram ar māti ir īpaši ciešas attiecības, sāk traucēt abu laimei.

programme.title: Afēristes
programme.desc: Viņas ir dejotājas elitārā striptīza klubā, kura klienti ir bagātie Volstrītas finansisti. Bet, kad banku krīze vienā mirklī izputina visus meiteņu uzkrājumus, viņas nolemj atriebties. Apķērīgās dāmas izdomā pārdrošu plānu, kā aptīrīt negodīgos biržas ģēnijus un atgūt zaudēto naudu.

programme.title: Rītdienas robeža
programme.desc: Zemi iekaro citplanētu iebrucēji, un pēc piecu gadu cīņām viņi ir gandrīz iekarojuši Eiropu. Ģenerālis Brigems (Brendans Glīsons) nosūta majoru Viljamu Keidžu (Toms Krūzs) kā dezertieri uz savu jauno vienību – J vadu. Jau pirmajā kaujā Keidžu nogalina, taču viņš šokēts atmostas iepriekšējā dienā. Izmisīgos centienos izlauzties no apnicīgās laika cilpas, Keidžu sāk trenēt elites kareive Rita Vrataski (Emīlija Blanta), kura ir cilvēces pretošanās simbols. Viņas vadībā Keidžs kļūst par Zemes labāko ieroci un iespēju, kā iznīcināt citplanētu iebrucējus.

programme.title: P.S. Es mīlu tevi
programme.desc: Holija Kenedija ir skaista, gudra un precējusies ar savu mūža mīlestību - kaislīgu, jautru un impulsīvu īru puisi Geriju. Taču kad slimība atņem Gerija dzīvību, Holijas dzīvei arī vairs nav jēgas. Vienīgais, kurš spētu palīdzēt, ir cilvēks, kura vairs nav. Neviens nepazīst Holiju labāk kā Gerijs. To viņš apzinājās vēl dzīvs būdams, un tāpēc uzrakstīja Holijai vēstules, kas palīdzēs bēdās un ļaus sākt dzīvi no jauna.

programme.title: Džons Viks
programme.desc: Džonam Vikam (Kianu Rīvss) pelnītā atpūtā neļauj doties un liek pierādīt savu titulu kā pasaules labākajam slepkavam itāļu noziedznieks Santino DAntonio (Rikardo Skamarsio), kuram Džons ir parādā par savu izglābšanu no bezcerīga stāvokļa. Viks dodas uz Romu, kur mēģina nogalināt Santino konkurentu un māsu Džiannu (Klaudija Džerini). Kad slepkavība neizdodas, Vikam jāstājas pretī visbīstamākajiem pasaules slepkavām. Viņam jāizmanto ikviens kontakts un visas savas nāvējošās prasmes, lai izsekotu un atriebtos cilvēkam, kurš viņu nodeva.

programme.title: Rītdienas robeža
programme.desc: Zemi iekaro citplanētu iebrucēji, un pēc piecu gadu cīņām viņi ir gandrīz iekarojuši Eiropu. programme.title: Brīnums
programme.desc: Desmitgadīgais Augusts Pulmens, kurš piedzima ar nopietnu sejas defektu un slimības dēļ līdz šim ir mācījies mājās, pirmoreiz dosies uz skolu, lai uzsāktu mācības vietējās skolas 5. klasē. Augija vienaudžiem nebūs viegli pieņemt citādo un aiz neparastās ārienes ieraudzīt to stipro, drosmīgo un labsirdīgo zēnu, ko pazīst viņa mīlošā ģimene. Lai gan Augijs pūlēsies būt tāds pats kā citi skolēni, viņš tikai vēlreiz apliecinās, ka ir īpašs, un ne jau neparastā izskata dēļ.

programme.title: Rītdienas cilvēks
programme.desc: Eds Hemslers savu dzīvi pavada, gatavojoties katastrofai, kas varētu nepienākt. Ronija Meisnere savu dzīvi veltījusi, pērkot lietas, kuras visdrīzāk nekad neizmantos. Šie divi cilvēki mēģinās atrast mīlestību.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Litogrāfijas mākslas radīšana.

programme.title: Brīnums
programme.desc: Desmitgadīgais Augusts Pulmens, kurš piedzima ar nopietnu sejas defektu un slimības dēļ līdz šim ir mācījies mājās, pirmoreiz dosies uz skolu, lai uzsāktu mācības vietējās skolas 5. klasē. programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Rītdienas cilvēks
programme.desc: Eds Hemslers savu dzīvi pavada, gatavojoties katastrofai, kas varētu nepienākt. Ronija Meisnere savu dzīvi veltījusi, pērkot lietas, kuras visdrīzāk nekad neizmantos. Šie divi cilvēki mēģinās atrast mīlestību.

programme.title: Brīnums
programme.desc: Desmitgadīgais Augusts Pulmens, kurš piedzima ar nopietnu sejas defektu un slimības dēļ līdz šim ir mācījies mājās, pirmoreiz dosies uz skolu, lai uzsāktu mācības vietējās skolas 5. klasē. Augija vienaudžiem nebūs viegli pieņemt citādo un aiz neparastās ārienes ieraudzīt to stipro, drosmīgo un labsirdīgo zēnu, ko pazīst viņa mīlošā ģimene. Lai gan Augijs pūlēsies būt tāds pats kā citi skolēni, viņš tikai vēlreiz apliecinās, ka ir īpašs, un ne jau neparastā izskata dēļ.

programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Biļete
programme.desc: Kad akls vīrietis negaidīti atgūst redzi, viņš kļūst apsēsts ar tieksmi pēc labākas dzīves - pēc smalkākas mājas, labāk apmaksāta darba, - neatstājot vietu cilvēkiem, kuri bija nozīmīgi viņa iepriekšējā dzīvē.

programme.title: Tu neesi tu
programme.desc: Algotais slepkava ar iesauku "Nāves eņģelis" Maikls Salivans uzticīgi kalpo savam bosam Džonam Rūnijam, pateicoties kuram reiz uz ielas atrastais bārenis Maiks ir ieguvis "augstāko izglītību" gangsteru profesijā. Aukstasinīgais un nežēlīgais Rūnijs - Čikāgas īru mafijas krusttēvs - , kura organizācija asi konkurē ar itāļiem, veldzējumu savai sirdij gūst vienīgi Maikla sabiedrībā un rotaļājoties ar Maikla abiem dēliem Maiklu junioru un Pīteru. Abu pusaudžu acīs pilsētas gangsteru vadonis ir ne vairāk kā jauks vectēvs - interesantu un audzinošu stāstu zinātājs un zēnu labākais draugs viņu kopējās spēlēs.

programme.title: Melnais gulbis
programme.desc: Ņujorkas baleta trupas balerīnas Ninas dzīve ir deja. Viņa dzīvo kopā ar māti Ēriku, kas ir izbijusi balerīna un aizgūtnēm atbalsta meitas profesionālās ambīcijas. Kad mākslinieciskais režisors izlemj nomainīt prīmu izrādē "Gulbju ezers", viņa izvēle ir tieši Nina. Tomēr viņai uzrodas konkurente - jaunā dejotāja Lilī, kuras sniegums arī aizrauj režisoru. Izrādei ir vajadzīga dejotāja, kas spēj nodejot gan Balto gulbi ar nevainību un grāciju, kā arī Melno gulbi, kas iemieso viltu un jutekliskumu. Nina pilnībā atbilst Baltā tēlam, bet Lilī ir Melnā gulbja iemiesojums. Kad jaunās dejotājas uzsāk sāncensību par šo lomu, viņu draudzība kļūst arvien sarežģītāka un Nina arvien vairāk saskaras ar draudzenes rakstura tumšo pusi un abas ir gatavas viena otru iznīcināt.

programme.title: Solo
programme.desc: Sekosim Saimonam, kuram jātiek galā ar divām neiespējamām vilšanām: kaislīgu, bet destruktīvu simpātiju pret Oliveru un attālām un aukstām attiecībām ar savu māti Klēru, kura tikko atgriezusies pie viņa pēc 15 gadu prombūtnes.

programme.title: 7 dienas un 7 naktis ar Merilinu Monro
programme.desc: Sera Lorensa Olivjē darbinieks Kolins Klarks dokumentē saspringto Olivjē un Merilinas Monro mijiedarbību filmas "Princis un šovmeitene" (1957) producēšanas laikā.

programme.title: Mans karalis. Drāma
programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldmans team and Ashley Holts team battle to make cakes inspired by their best meal ever and featuring hyper realistic food.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Tulsa. Noah Cappe, Aarti Sequeira and Joe Sasto to explore Italian and Caribbean cuisine, banh mi, delicatessen fare and elevated cowboy cooking in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Joplin. Noah Cappe, Aarti Sequeira and Joe Sasto head to Joplin, Missouri to find the best local dish. There they try everything from tacos and sushi to BBQ and fine dining.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Ranch To Table
programme.desc: Elizabeth celebrates fall by hosting her annual apple cider press party! She serves up ranch meatloaf and apple empanadas with bourbon whipped cream.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Host Laila Ali challenges chefs to settle their disputes in a single round, head-to-head culinary battle. They all come here to call each other out, put their favorite knives on the line, and bury the hatchet. The winners walk out with $10,000 cash, a prized knife from the losing chefs knife roll and bragging rights for life!

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine makes a feast without a kitchen for 30 people in Oahu, Hawaii. He battles the weather and manages an unpredictable underground oven.

programme.title: Guys Ultimate Game Night
programme.desc: Guy Fieri and Antonia Lofaso welcome Cheech Marin, Maria Menounos and Billy Gardell to the Flavortown Lounge for an epic night of games and food!

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine makes a feast without a kitchen for 30 people in Oahu, Hawaii. He battles the weather and manages an unpredictable underground oven.

programme.title: Guys Ultimate Game Night
programme.desc: Guy Fieri and Antonia Lofaso welcome Cheech Marin, Maria Menounos and Billy Gardell to the Flavortown Lounge for an epic night of games and food!

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Host Laila Ali challenges chefs to settle their disputes in a single round, head-to-head culinary battle. They all come here to call each other out, put their favorite knives on the line, and bury the hatchet. The winners walk out with $10,000 cash, a prized knife from the losing chefs knife roll and bragging rights for life!

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Those who care
programme.desc: Over 4,000 official volunteers and thousands of those who came at the call of their hearts: the program "Nebyduzhi" reveals the face of foreign volunteering in Ukraine. programme.title: Vēl viens šāviens
programme.desc: Filma seko jūras kājinieku komandas līderim, kas eskortē aizdomās turētu teroristu. Operācijas laikā viņus sāk apšaudīt algotņi.

programme.title: Bostonas slepkava
programme.desc: 60. gados Bostonu pārbiedē virkne nežēlīgu slepkavību, kuru upuri ir sievietes. Spītējot tā laika uzskatam par sieviešu lomu sabiedrībā un viedokli, ka daiļā dzimuma pārstāvēm jāraksta par modi un izklaidi, nevis jāšķetina nopietni noziegumi, Loreta un viņas kolēģe Džīna Koula atklāj, ka Bostonā notikušās sieviešu nožņaugšanas ir savstarpēji saistītas un tās paveicis sērijveida slepkava. Loreta slepkavu nodēvē par "Bostonas žņaudzēju", četru rakstu sērijā atklājot satraucošas likumsakarības un iestāžu kļūdas, kas ļāva slepkavam nekontrolēti darboties.

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Kā lauvam, zebrai, žirafei, nīlzirgam, bariņam pingvīnu, lemuru un pērtiķu tikt cauri Eiropai, nepievēršot sev lieku uzmanību? Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un viņu draugi pievienojas ceļojošajam cirkam, cerībā atkal nokļūt mājās, Ņujorkā. Melmens iemācīsies staigāt pa virvi, karalis Džūljens neglābjami iemīlēsies... Īsi sakot - viņu mājupceļš būs īsts cirks!

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Biogrāfiska drāma par izcilās ASV dziedātājas un aktrises Džūdijas Gārlendas dzīvi. Gārlenda 1968. gadā, gadu pirms savas nāves, devās uz Eiropu, lai koncertētu Londonā. Filmā attēloti pēdējie mēneši kinozvaigznes dzīvē, pirms viņa izdarīja pašnāvību.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Līdz pēdējam
programme.desc: Filmu "Amerikāņu skaistums" un "Optimista stāsts" veidotāji piedāvā uz patiesiem notikumiem balstītu stāstu par leģendāro bokseri Viniju Pacienca, kurš 1991. gadā cieta smagā autokatastrofā, gūstot smagu mugurkaula traumu. Kamēr ārsti nesolīja neko labu un ieteica Vinijam aizmirst par sportista karjeru, viņš pilnīgā slepenībā sāka apmeklēt sporta zāli un jau pēc trim mēnešiem atgriezās ringā.

programme.title: Tumšākā stunda
programme.desc: Kad Otrā pasaules kara laikā Ādolfa Hitlera varenā Vērmahta armija plosās Eiropā, Lielbritānijas premjerministrs Nevils Čemberleins ir spiests atkāpties no amata, savā vietā iesakot Vinstonu Čērčilu. Jau pašā premjera darbības sākumā Čērčilam jāizlemj, vai vest miera sarunas ar Vācijas diktatoru vai cīnīties ar šķietami neuzveicamo nacistu režīmu aci pret aci, lai ko tas arī prasītu. Neraugoties uz grūto un iespējami bīstamo lēmumu, Čērčilam nav citas izvēles, kā mirdzēt savas valsts tumšākajā stundā.

programme.title: Bēdīgi slavenie mērgļi
programme.desc: Vāciešu okupētajā Francijā Šosanna Dreifusa kļūst par liecinieci tam, kā nacistu pulkvedis Hanss Landa noslepkavo viņas ģimeni. Šosannai par mata tiesu izdodas izsprukt un aizbēgt uz Parīzi, kur viņa pieņem citu identitāti un kļūst par kinoteātra īpašnieci. Tajā pašā laikā kaut kur citur Eiropā leitnants Aldo Reins sapulcina grupu ebreju kareivju, kuru mērķis ir atriebties ienaidniekam. Nacistiem šis grupējums kļūst pazīstams ar nosaukumu "mērģļi". Reina grupējumam pievienojas jauna vācu aktrise un slepenā aģente Bridžeta fon Hameršmarka, kuras uzdevums ir gāzt Trešā reiha vadoņus. Likteņa pavērsieni saved visus kopā ar Šosannu, kurai ir pašai savs atriebības plāns….

programme.title: Arkādija
programme.desc: Nikolass Keidžs atveido tēvu, kurš pasaules gala laikā, nomaļā lauku sētā, kopā ar saviem dvīņu puikām cīnās par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ir pagājis labs laiks kopš Ziemassvētkiem, kad Makkalisteru ģimene, dodoties brīvdienās, pirmo reizi aizmirsa mājās Kevinu. Šos Ziemassvētkus Kevins nolēmis pavadīt sava tēta bagātās draudzenes Natālijas milzīgajā savrupmājā. Taču mierīgais vakars viņam kārtējo reizi izvēršas par īstu piedzīvojumu, jo Natālijas māju svētkos nolēmuši apciemot zagļi. Starp citu, vienam no viņiem ar Kevinu ir kārtojami veci rēķini!

programme.title: Ķieģeli pa ķieģelītim
programme.desc: Animācijas filma "Lego" klucīšu stilā par Farela Viljamsa dzīvi. Filmā, kurā galvenās lomas ierunājis pats Farels Viljamss (Pharrell Williams), kā arī Kendriks Lamārs (Kendrick Lamar) un Džastins Timberleiks (Justin Timberlake), ķieģelīti pa ķieģelītim tiek pārskatīta mākslinieka karjera.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Bezrūpīgā brunču mednieka Semjuela dzīvē viss ir vienkārši un viegli, taču kādā jaukā dienā ar mazuli uz rokām uzrodas viena no viņa neskaitāmajām draudzenēm Kristīna. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir viņa meita, Kristīna aizlido uz Londonu, atstājot Semu vienu ar bērniņu. Pēkšņi par tēvu kļuvušais Sems, vēl neatguvies no šoka, kopā ar mazulīti lido uz Angliju cerībā uzmeklēt meitenītes māti. Tā kā meklējumi ir nesekmīgi, Semam atliek vien samierināties ar jauno tēva lomu un vienam audzināt meitu. Taču pēc astoņiem gadiem meitenītes māte tomēr uzrodas….

programme.title: Mīlestība dejas ritmā
programme.desc: Talantīgā balerīna Bārlova nolēmusi īstenot savu sapni Amerikas mākslas svētnīcā Ņujorkā. Diemžēl iepazīšanās ar svētnīcas realitāti nav īpaši patīkama – pieredzējusī baleta pasniedzēja Oksana skaidri un gaiši pasaka: Bārlova vēl nav ne tuvu pilnībai. Norijusi krupi, meitene nepadodas un piedalās jaunas Brodvejas deju izrādes atlasē. Režisors Zanders pievērš uzmanību Bārlovai un izvēlas viņu mēģinājumiem. Pēc dažām dienām topošās izrādes kodolam pievienojas talantīgais pianists Čārlijs. Tāpat kā Bārlova, viņš ieradies Ņujorkā, lai īstenotu sapni. Puisim un meitenei rodas simpātijas vienam pret otru, bet Zanders nav vienaldzīgs pret meiteni. Bārlova drīz vien sapinas mīlas trīsstūrī. Izrādes mēģinājumi kļūst arvien intensīvāki, slodze aug, un ne Bārlovai, ne Čārlijam neatliek laika nekam citam. Darbs vaiga sviedros, nemitīgā spriedze, sāncenšu nodevība un cīņa bez kompromisiem prasa visus spēkus.

programme.title: Aizbēgt
programme.desc: Tumša šausmu komēdija par ģimenes brīvdienām nomaļā kūrortā, kuras par neaizmirstamām padara fakts, ka uz salas uzdarbojas arī kāds sērijveida slepkava.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Džonam Makleinam diez ko neveicas. Viņa laulība pamazām izirst, viņš ir atstādināts no amata, un nu Hansa Grūbera (vācu terorists, kuru Džons nosvieda no jumta pirms pāris gadiem) brālis draud uzspridzināt kādu skolu, ja Makleins nepiekritīs skraidīt pa pilsētu, cenšoties atrisināt Grūbera bīstamos uzdevumus.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

Tune in, witness some exciting football action, and discover who will be the champion!

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Olimpia Milano - Anadolu Efes
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: Reality TV show presents further steps taken by the families who achieved their dreams and purchased vacation homes. Now their next task is to renovate it and make it look like a true house of their dreams, beautiful, cosy and relaxing. Its quite a tough task requiring much efforts and creativity. Have a look at the show and see for yourself that renovation can be budget friendly and fun.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Island Life

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Professional dancers Joseph and Susan, along with their two children, are ready to start a new chapter in their lives. They want out of their tiny New York City apartment and to find more space near the beach on Amelia Island, Florida.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: After falling in love with Orcas Island while on holiday, Matt and Sara are ready to leave noisy Seattle for a quieter island life. Theyll see different homes with gorgeous views, and then decide which place best suits them.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: Reality TV show presents further steps taken by the families who achieved their dreams and purchased vacation homes. Now their next task is to renovate it and make it look like a true house of their dreams, beautiful, cosy and relaxing. Its quite a tough task requiring much efforts and creativity. Have a look at the show and see for yourself that renovation can be budget friendly and fun.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: Russell visits an artsy couple after a major setback with the foundation brought renovations on their cramped, dated home to halt.

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: A couple has too-ambitious dreams for their new house. With some big compromises and a creative design plan, Russell creates their perfect forever home.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home

Reality series.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions

programme.title: The Nate And Jeremiah Home Project
programme.desc: A couple who saved for 15 years are ready to start their home renovation. Nate and Jeremiah help transform their home into the space theyve always dreamed of.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Vacation House for Free is a reality TV show hosted by Matt Blashaw, real estate expert and licensed contractor with fantastic handyman skills he gained while working at his fathers lumberyard through college. Matt makes dreams come true for those who want to buy a vacation house and be mortgage free, he teaches them how to use rental income to cover the costs of owning it. Matt finds a property at a right price, renovates it and places it on the rental market. So his clients can get income when not living there and by doing so they get it for free.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Italiano
programme.desc: With summer upon them, Dave and Jenny make the decision to take their five kids on a trip to Italy so they can make major progress at the villa.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Famous jailbreaks are the stuff of legend as their true stories are often untold. Now, with dramatic recreations, dynamic storytelling and cutting-edge visual effects, escapes from prisons like Alcatraz will come to life in graphic detail in the new nonfiction series "Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman." Hosted by Academy Award® winner Morgan Freeman, each episode will unearth every step of an inmates meticulous plan, the escape route and the intense manhunt that immediately followed.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Sightings of the Yeti, a creature of myth and legend, has been recorded for thousands of years throughout the Himalayas and surrounding regions. Could this creature be hiding in plain sight? And if the Yeti does exist, what is it exactly?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner

With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.
